wikipedia_page.main: Alexis Hall (born 23 January 1980) is a British actress, professional singer, and model from Manchester.

response: * Alexis Hall plays model scout Precious, in love with Troy and insanely jealous of the females who get his attention. Cunning and sly, but a good friend.
* Alexis Hall (actress) (born 1980), British actress, singer and model
